Npix.title: Number of pixels on a side.

QE.title: Spectral distribution of quantum efficiency (W?? in um; V?? QE value).

Nmargin.title: Number of margin pixels for simpix calculation.

stddev.title: standard deviation of the interpixel flat.

intrapix.title: Information about files describing intrapixel pattern.

file_x.title: Path to the definiton file of the intrapix flat pattern along with the x-axis.

file_y.title: Path to the definiton file of the intrapix flat pattern along with the y-axis.

readparams.title: Parameters related to the reset/read operation.

ncol_ch.title: Num. of col. in one ch.

nrow_ch.title: Num. of row in one ch.

t_overhead.title: Overhead time between reset and the 1st read in sec.

location.title: Parameters defining the detector location on the telescope focal plane.

offset_x.title: Offset in x direction in mm.

offset_y.title: Offset in y direction in mm.
